House Bill/Resolution NO. HB02150
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROVIDING FOR FULL IRRIGATION SERVICE SUBSIDY FOR QUALIFIED FARMERS, CONDONATION OF UNPAID IRRIGATION SERVICE FEES, AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS FOR THE CONTINUED OPERATIONS OF THE NATIONAL IRRIGATION ADMINISTRATION
SHORT TITLE : Free Irrigation Service For Small Farmers Act
ABSTRACT : Seeks to assist small landowners and farm workers who suffer gross neglect in spite of the increasing demand for the commodity they produce and thus, mitigate the impact of rising cost of agricultural inputs by providing for full irrigation subsidy for small landowners who cultivate five hectares of land or less.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : PINEDA, ENRICO A., ROMERO, MICHAEL ODYLON L., Ph.D.
DATE FILED : 2016-08-01
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Welfare
